content.text: Hi! What do you like to do for fun?
I enjoy running marathons. I love the feeling of accomplishment I get after I finish a race.
That's great! I love to travel and explore new places. I'm also a software engineer, but I enjoy watching makeup tutorials in my spare time.
That's awesome! I have a collection of children's books that I love to read. I also spend a lot of time exercising and eating healthy foods to maintain my toned body.
That's great! I love to play the drums. I also have a pet cat who loves to nap on my bed.
That's great! I love cats! I'm afraid of not being able to beat my competitors in the marathon.
That's understandable. I'm sure you'll do great!
